purpose: To provide simplified and easily digestible explanations of advanced technology concepts.
principle: Leverages clear, concise writing and illustrative examples to break down complex topics into quick-read tutorials.
reusability: Content can be repurposed for educational materials, presentations, or integrated into larger learning platforms.
limitations: Limited to brief explanations; may not cover all aspects of a topic comprehensively.
name: one-small-step
description: 这是一个简单的技术科普教程项目，主要聚焦于解释一些有趣的，前沿的技术概念和原理。每篇文章都力求在 5 分钟内阅读完成。
highlight: Concise, engaging tutorials on cutting-edge technology concepts, designed for quick consumption.
